name: Welcome to Silverscale Lake!
description:
"Ah, Silverscale Lake. It's never really recovered after the disaster in the factory. Such a shame."

"Welcome To Silverscale Lake!" is a small-town mystery set in a "mundanely magical" modern-day/very near future world with science-fantasy elements, taking place over the course of 9 days. The story revolves around your party's quest to figure out the truth behind the tragic disaster that shut down the magi-tech factory 20 years ago, and figure out why so many people seem to be so interested in it now after all these years. 

cw: this game deals pretty heavily in themes of shared/communal trauma & everything that entails

(Please note that this is the first alpha of my first completed RPG Maker game; bugs can be reported with this form: https://forms.gle/opyn1WKFpt33BNC4A)

Follow Welcome To Silverscale Lake! on Facebook here!
